verbose_text: XREF_BIBR In contrast, Grhl1 -/- mice show hair loss and palmoplantar keratoderma, as well as abnormal desmosome cell junctions and dysregulated terminal differentiation in keratinocytes.
evidence: Grhl1 -/-  mice show hair loss and palmoplantar keratoderma, as well as abnormal desmosome cell junctions and dysregulated terminal differentiation
